message.content: {"id": "6656", "title": "Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller", "description": "When resizing the view to a smaller size, the close button and label no longer stay on the same line. This can pose a usability problem as users expect the close button to be on the same line as the label, located to the far right corner.", "OB": "Previously, the close button and label always stayed on the same line, regardless of the size of the view.", "EB": "Now, when resizing the view to a smaller size, the close button and label no longer stay on the same line.", "SR": "On Linux, running build 20011127 (not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000), when resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size, the tool items move below the label."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6656', 'title': 'Bug 6656Close button moves down when view resized smaller', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'These two tool items use to stay on the same line as the label nomatter how small the view got.In my opinion, this is going to be a usuability problem. Users are accustomedto the close button being on the same line as the label and located to the farright corner. ', 'SR': 'On linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000).When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move belowthe label. '}
